body.p: To open the Saxon HE/PE/EE preferences page, go to Options Window Preferences oXygen XML Editor XML XSLT/FO/XQuery XQuery Saxon HE/PE/EE .
The XQuery preferences for the Saxon are the following:

ul.li: Use a configuration file ("-config") - sets a Saxon 9 configuration file that is used for XQuery transformation and validation;

Optimization level - this option allows optimization to be suppressed in cases where reducing compile time is important, or where optimization gets in the way of debugging, or causes extension functions with side-effects to behave unpredictably.
Use linked tree model - this option activates the linked tree model. Enable this option if you are using XQuery Update.

body.p: The Saxon Professional Edition options are the following:

ul.li: Disable calls on extension functions - if unchecked, external functions calls is allowed. Checking this is recommended in an environment where untrusted stylesheets may be executed. Also disables user-defined extension elements, together with the writing of multiple output files, all of which carry similar security risks.

body.p: The Saxon Enterprise Edition specific options are the following:

ul.li: Validation of the source - this determines whether XML source documents should be parsed with schema-validation enabled;
